text: Hey team, looking to work with Blake Morgan for Lush. Budget is approx $8,523 - need 2 x 2-minute tutorial, 3 x Instagram story, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x 60-second YouTube video, 2 x 30-second Instagram reel. 10 weeks exclusivity, 2 month engagement. Usage: 11 months. Start date: October 2025. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $8,523 budget
